data.name: GeneralInfo
data.value: Using the neighborhood budget of the City of Ghent, VZW Buut purchased three boats (type Whaly 450 classic), powered by an electric motor.

data.name: TributeInfo
data.value: These three boats, Lubeck, Limba, and Leith, were named after streets in the Muide-Meulestee-Afrikalaan neighborhood. These streets are named after ports. Names beginning with the letter L were chosen as a tribute to the late community worker Lucien De Ridder.

data.name: RegisterNowInfo
data.value: Neighborhood residents can reserve the boats online. For more information, visit the 'HOW TO BECOME A MEMBER' page.

data.name: DockInfo
data.value: Enjoy the tranquility and beauty of our neighborhood from the water, from the Meulestedebrug to Keizerspark. The boats are permanently docked at the lower quay on Terneuzenlaan.
